instruction: There will be amazing goodies given to the top ten scorers
You will have to answer in 'one word' pertaining to the phrase or image shown here
The next question will not open unless you have got the correct answer to the previous one

Player 1 ranks higher than Player 2, if he has a higher score (more correct answers). If they have the same score then the one who answered the last correct fastest is the one is ranks higher in the leaderboard
Most important instruction is to Have Fun !
